text: The Bank of Guam is a financial institution based in the territory of Guam, a United States territory located in the western Pacific Ocean. Established in 1972, the Bank of Guam has grown to become one of the largest banks in Guam and has expanded its presence to other jurisdictions, including the Commonwealth of the Northern Mariana Islands, Federated States of Micronesia, Republic of Palau, and the Republic of the Marshall Islands. == Awards and Recognition == The Bank of Guam has received many awards and accolades over the years for its services and contributions to the community. Some of the notable recognitions include: * "Best Bank in Guam" by the readers of the Pacific Daily News. * "Bank of the Year in Micronesia" by The Banker magazine. * "Top Community Bank in Micronesia" by the Independent Community Bankers of America Category:Guam Category:Banks of the United States
title: Bank of Guam
